attributes.action: Give Those Fighting for our Country  The Means to Support Upon Return
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: men and women who in many ways give up their basic human rights once they join our armed services should be given a support package and mentoring system that allows them access to community housing, free access to education and private health insurance for up to 5 years after they leave the services.These young persons often find themselves homeless and without the skills needed in civvy street, yet we expect them to die for our country , that is fundamentally wrong. Convicted prisoners are treated better this cannot be right !
